items.content_html: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.
items.title: Heiko-Lemmert/join-project: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.

items.content_html: The image-effect-renderer is lightweight package that allows you to run fragment shaders in your website using WebGL. It can be used to apply effects to HTML image or video sources. Zero dependencies.
items.title: mediamonks/image-effect-renderer: The image-effect-renderer is lightweight package that allows you to run fragment shaders in your website using WebGL. It can be used to apply effects to HTML image or video sources.  Zero dependencies.

items.content_html: A fast, lightweight, and scalable open-source DBMS for modern apps. Supports JSON-based data storage, simple APIs, and secure data management. Ideal for projects needing efficient and flexible database solutions.
